نــسخــت
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
شهــد مــن أثبت شــهــدته في آخر هذا هذه البراه على إقرار أم عــ زوجة جبريل بن جعفر الجدّي أنّها
قبضت من زوجها جبريل بن جعفر دينارين مثاقيل طــري جياد عن معجّل صداقها وحازت وأبرت زوجها جبريل بن جعفر
من هاذين الدّينارين براه قبض واستيفا وذلك في رجب من سنة سبع وتسعين ومائتن شهد على ذلك

nusiḫat
bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
šahida man ʾaṯbata šahādata hu fī ʾāḫiri hāḏā hāḏihi ăl barāʾaẗi ʿalà ʾiqrāri ʾummi ʿa** zawǧaẗi ǧibrīla bni ǧaʿfara ăl ǧaddiyyi ǧuddiyyi ʾanna hā
qabaḍat min zawǧi hā ǧibrīla bni ǧaʿfara dīnārayni maṯāqīla ṭarī ǧiyād ʿan muʿaǧǧali ṣadāqi hā wa ḥāzat wa ʾabrat zawǧa hā ǧibrīla bna ǧaʿfara
min hāḏayni ăd dīnārayni barāʾaẗa qabḍ:in wa ĭstīfāʾ:in wa ḏālika fī raǧab:in min sanaẗi sabʿ:in wa tisʿīna wa miʾatayni šahida ʿalà ḏālika

Co[pi]é. [Copi]ed.
Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Ceux [qui ont apposé] leurs té[moig]nages à la fin de cette quittance de décharge ont [témoig]né qu'Umm ʿA[...], femme de Ǧibrīl Ibn Ǧaʿfar al-Ǧuddī, a reconnu [Tho]se who have s[et] their sig[na]tures at the end of this receipt [have been witnesses] to the acknowledgment by Umm ʿA[...], the wife of Ǧibrîl b. Ǧaʿfar, originating from Ǧudda, that she has
avoir reçu de son mari, Ǧibrīl Ibn Ǧaʿfar, deux dīnārs (pesés) en miṯqāl-s, [nouvel]lement monnayés et [excellen]ts, de la partie de sa dot payable immédiatement, (les avoir) possédés et acquitté son mari Ǧibrīl Ibn Ǧaʿfar taken over from her husband, Ǧibrîl b. Ǧaʿfar, two dînârs miṯqâlî [newly minted, good pieces], from that which is immediately exigible of her nuptial gift, she has taken it into her possession, and has given a quittance to her husband, Ǧibrîl b. Ǧaʿfar,
de ces deux dīnārs, par le moyen d'une quittance de libération attestant réception et perception intégrale, et ceci en raǧab de l'année deux cent quatre-vingt-dix-sept. On a témoigné de cela. for these two dînârs by means of a receipt, (acknowledging that she has) received and taken (them) over fully, and this in Raǧab of the year two hundred and ninety seven. (The following witnesses) have testified to it.
